website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy stainless steel bottle that keeps cold drinks cold and hot drinks hot for an impressively long time.
pros: Double-wall insulation keeps hot drinks hot for 14 hours and cold drinks cold for 40 hours
Includes the Cafe Cup 2.0, which is truly spill-proof when closed
Wide mouth is easy to fill and clean
cons: Paint can chip on the outside if bumped or dropped

customer_reviews.title: Good bottle, a miss on the cap.
customer_reviews.text: Bottle is nice. Lid leaks. Not so much a design problem as much as a material problem. The rubber seal is too stiff, you can't tighten the nut enough to get it to seal. I over tightened so the plastic clamp between the nut and seal twisted around the stem, and then it wouldn't leak. This would eventually strip the stem. Edit 12/14/17 There is a ridge top (concave side, middle not outer edge) of the piece that clamps onto the rubber seal. I removed this with my dremel. Still not leak PROOF but only a drop our two comes out instead of a small stream when turned upside down.
customer_reviews.author: IamJon

customer_reviews.title: Great thermos, poor exterior finish
customer_reviews.text: I spent extra money to purchase the blue kanteen so that we could easily tell our thermoses apart. But the paint is chipping off after only a couple of weeks, even though my husband carries it in his insulated pack away from damaging articles. It is an excellent thermos as far as keeping drinks hot. Marking off only for the non-chip resistant exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Love my Klean Kanteen
customer_reviews.text: Love my Klean Kanteen! Everything stays warm and cold. I am a Luke warm coffee drinker so if I leave the top open and put some cold almond milk in, it is the perfect temperature and stays that way all day long. I also like how it doesn't have any weird smells. Often times my old mugs would have a lingering smell - sometimes even smell like dishwasher detergent. Not my Klean Kanteen! Only Complaint: Just after a month of having my mug, the color is bubbling and chipping away. Will contact manufacturer to see if they can do anything for me.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: This thermos/canteen is great. I had been looking for one for transporting ...
customer_reviews.text: This thermos/canteen is great. I had been looking for one for transporting my daily iced cold brew coffee from home to work without leaking and still able to keep everything cold all day with or without the ice. This thermos/canteen met all of my needs. It never ever leaks, the design of the lid is both easy to clean and leak proof. The wide mouth shape is perfect for drinking without risk of spilling anything on myself by accident. The 20oz is just right for filling with 16oz of cold brew and the rest of the space for ice. The exterior finish/coating I thought would be slippery when wet but surprisingly it doesn't get slick when wet.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Don't over analyze it, I already did for you. you want this one.
customer_reviews.text: Klean Kanteen makes the best tops in this whole insulated drinkware craze, and I'm pretty picky. They also seem to pull a better vacuum (insulation) on their bottles than hydro flask, but I cant tell the difference b/t them and Yeti. Anyway, better top design, so the tie breaker goes to them! Not a huge fan of the colors, they will all eventually chip, but buy the striaght stainless one, and youll be happy forever. Smart look, great functionality! Oh, also, the polished bottom piece is a nice touch. I think its really just redundant protection over the bottom and the seal where they pulled the air out, but I for one appreciate the detail.
customer_reviews.author: Life according to Ted

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded our expectation in keeping drinks hot
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband who wanted a thermal bottle that could keep his beverage hot for hours. This definitely exceeded our expectation as it kept his coffee hot for actually longer than he expected (the company claims up to 10 hours, but he did not keep his beverage in the bottle for that long). Nice matte color and we did not have any leak issue. The top part was easy to disassemble to clean, but my gripe is that you need a good bottle brush to clean the inside of the 16 oz bottle (and probably 22 oz) thoroughly, as the opening is too small to be able to fit most adult hand with a sponge to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ichthus

customer_reviews.title: Burnt back because it LEAKS after FIRST use :((((
customer_reviews.text: Today put this cup with a hot tea into a water pocket of my backpack and went shopping. When I leant for the dress I felt sharp burning sensation and was so frightened as I couldn't get what's happening for a moment. Guess what? - my leak proof klean kanteen poured hot tea on me(the statement about keeping the temperature high is unfortunately right in this case) :(((((((. It was burning and hurting for an hour and now I have a burn mark on my back. So frustrated, if the description wouldn't lie about leak proof cap I wouldn't put it in a backpack for sure. Definitely want to return!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: It leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This mug holds the temperature amazingly well...but it leaks! Within a few weeks this mug was leaking. I figured it was just a defect for the one mug since the other one I purchased at the same time didn’t leak. However yesterday my other one leaked all over my new car! It’s 11 months old. Not used daily and it’s already worn out? For this price, I am sadly disappointed and won’t be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: THE best out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Klean Kanteen mug and certainly not disappointed. It's my every day work coffee mug and will keep my coffee hot most of the day and even very warm after 12hrs of storage. By far, the most efficient thermos type mug I've ever used. The lid is well made and won't leak even when on its side for the whole day. Easy to clean as well and the mug doesn't create a "plastic" flavor in my coffee due to the stainless liner.
customer_reviews.author: Griz

customer_reviews.title: My favorite coffee cup!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to Klean Kanteen cups by a friend who happened to leave theirsat my house. I was rushing to work one morning, my coffee cup was dirty and decided to try out the one my friend left. I was hooked after that! I couldn't believe that this coffee cup that fits in the palm of my hand could keep my coffee hot all day and not change the taste, which I hate about others. I immediately started searching Amazon for my own! I love my Klean Kanteen cup and have now turned my son onto them...he keeps stealing mine...guess its time to buy him one!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, easy to clean, & truly spill proof (despite what some other reviews are saying)
customer_reviews.text: I carry this thing with me everywhere, it is as inseparable as my phone and wallet. I was looking for a thermos that was one piece (no separate lid), spill proof, and easy to clean. This thing is all of that. Got the yellow one, so it is pretty much impossible to misplace. SOME reviews are complaining about it not being fully spill proof. Make sure to tighten the plastic wingnut on the underside of the lid in order to solve this. My guess is that these are being shipped loose so that it easier to do a first-time cleaning out, which is of course highly recommended for any thermos you buy anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Hind

customer_reviews.title: Cap is lacking. It leaks.
customer_reviews.text: The Cafe Cap 2.0 needs another revision. I like the rest of the Kanteen, it hold hot coffee all day, it's slim, and has a nice finish. Taking the cap apart was a little cumbersome the first time, but easier after that. My main complaint is that it still leaks sometimes when closed. I can't figure out if parts are worn already or its just a inferior design. The locking nut of the cap can't be tightened down too tight or else it will strip the hex part of the cap stem. Lastly, I wish the opening was just a little bigger to fit an Aero Press.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product in general, dont trust the "leak proof lid"
customer_reviews.text: This is my third insulated klean kanteen, I love them in general. unfortunately this one arrived with a defective cap. A "leak proof" cap is kind of useless when it was securely closed but you arrive at your destination with tea all in and over your bag. took it apart when I got home and it still had an issue when it went back together.
customer_reviews.author: bec

customer_reviews.title: Love This Design
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out very well for me. As to folks describing that it leaks, there is a method to disassembling and reassembling the components that are fastened to the underside of the screw on top. Unless they are assembled correctly I can see how leaking may occur. If you want a more simplistic design then this item may net be you best choice. Otherwise, great product, zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: MarkInNH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect water bottle for the office and on commutes
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle. The wide mouth is so much easier to clean than other regular bottles, and the bottle keeps my drinks warm or cold for a very long time. The exterior paint still ooks always nice after many months of use, in spite of small dents on the metal bottom. Only con: it's either a direct sip or an easy to hold cap, not both (I mean, a cap you can conveniently hold with a hook and an opening to drink without unscrewing the entire cap). Could find such Klean Kanteen caps (with the 2 functions) in some supermarkets, but not here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: JulieT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: A $26 coffee cup that leaks from the closed lid on day one? Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: jmill13

customer_reviews.title: Great at keeping coffee warm and contained
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this travel mug for over a month and am really enjoying all its features. I like the top, which is the main reason I purchased keen kanteen, for the leak proof top, and it is working quite well. I put the mug in my purse to take it into work and have not had a spill yet. My coffee also stays warm for hours, which allows me to enjoy my coffee all morning. I do not find the cap to dispense coffee too slowly like other reviewers, but I am more of a coffee sipper than big gulper.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite out of top 3 — right size, good closure, just the right balance of lightness and insulation
customer_reviews.text: 1st place — tried top 3 rated mugs and this is my favorite. Right size to fit my purse. Excellent insulation! Light for that insulation. Fits in my purse very well. I keep on reaching for this one over and over. The lid could have better indication of when its closed or opened. Now I have to squint my eyes to see whether the little black circle on the black background is solid or empty. So that has caused two small leaks but I got the hang of it
customer_reviews.author: Robyn P.

customer_reviews.title: NOT LEAK PROOF and easy to get worn
customer_reviews.text: The bottle looks quite beautiful but after a couple of times I dropped it, the paint went off, leaving white dots, which makes the bottle look like it has been used for years. What’s more, the lid is made up of so many details, so it’s quite hard to clean it. And what’s the worst thing is that it is NOT leak proof
customer_reviews.author: Phuong Pham

customer_reviews.title: 100% excellent at leaking
customer_reviews.text: We have a few Klean kanteens and overall really love them. I love the bottle itself...cute, great quality. The lid however is not as advertised. It actually excels quite excellently at leaking. Imagine a bottle that is sealed up tight to where not a drop of liquid spills out when you turn it upside down or even to the side. Now imagine the opposite of that and you have this lid. I have coffee all over my bag because it leaked so skillfully and efficiently. I’m thinking that the advertisers just got a little confused and meant to put leak-proficient instead of leak proof. Also important to note that in case I wasn’t super clear, this is isn’t leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: about 2 months in and I love it. Keeps everything very warm and very cold
customer_reviews.text: about 2 months in and I love it. Keeps everything very warm and very cold. Had ice coffee and left in the car in Texas heat. The bottle was almost too hot to hold, but still held ice for hours. Bought the coffee lid 2.0 (the leakproof one) and made it even better. 4 stars because the finish had very minor scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Sang Baik

customer_reviews.title: It was usable and still seemed to keep my coffee warm but the rattle was annoying. This is my replacement because my first one ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these in 4 years. My first one lasted 4 years and went with me every where. It would keep my coffee hot till was done with my coffee and it usually takes me a couple hours to drink my coffee. If I'm traveling, I have another lid I bring so that I can stop at the gas station for water My old Kanteen started rattling inside. It was usable and still seemed to keep my coffee warm but the rattle was annoying. This is my replacement because my first one served me so well, and I have another brand for my water and it's OK but this is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps liquids hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: Keeps coffee hot for at least 4hrs (if you don't open). That part was the most important to me as other containers fail at keeping the liquid hot. I'm not sure how long it'll stay hot if you keep opening it (to sip coffee), but I'd say at least an 1.5hrs (last me through church service), because I tend to sip the same cup of coffee for hours.. Hydroflask would barely last 30 min. So, so far - I'm loving it. Worth the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Olechka

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I'm originally from Northern California so I had to support a Chico brand! Cute color, I use it daily for tea, coffee, etc. bring it to and from my classroom and this keeps everything hot for a long time. It's 18/8 food grade stainless steel which I like. It doesn't leak at the neck or the top like the Hydroflasks I've had in the past would (all over my car at that). You can take the whole lid apart for washing, which I prefer. I really like this mug!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The cap ended up leaking.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this Kanteen. It's a good size, I love the matte coating, the 'cafe cap' is really comfortable to drink from...... but after a couple weeks, like many others, the cap started leaking. I cleaned it, reseated all the pieces multiple times, tightened down the "nut", but it still leaked. And not just a drop either. With a lightly inverted shake the liquid will almost stream out. It was a good effort. Maybe 3.0 will get it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh duh
customer_reviews.text: Came back to review this thing. After taking the cap apart for washing, I realized the “screw” wasn’t tight enough. If you order this product make sure to tighten the little star shape screw on the cap. ————————- Leak proof? When and how? Luckily it was only water the leaked on my trunk. Can’t believe I paid 30 bucks for this.
customer_reviews.author: victor garcia

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Coffee Hot
customer_reviews.text: This works even better than I expected. It keeps my coffee hot for at least six hours. The only downside is that if I want to drink it in the first two hours, I have to pour it into another cup! But I’m fine with that since I use the cup for taking coffee to work or when I know I won’t get to my coffee right away. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: S.M. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Chipped paint and leaking lid
customer_reviews.text: The bottle arrived with chipped paint and the lid leaks. I have other bottles from Klean Kanteen and they were made with better quality. This one didn't come with the paper instructions inside the bottle like others.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleMomJ

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product that does exactly what it says
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says it does. Did some cold water tests to verify claims made by Klean Kanteen. Tested a full Kanteen with tap water and half way filled with ice cubes and left it over night in a 70 degree office. 16 hours later came back to the office and the Kanteen still had a huge chunk of ice in it. 40 hours later after the setting up the experiment, the ice is gone but water is still cold. By the end of today will be 48 hours and I fully expect it to still be chilled but not ice cold. This is an amazing product that does exactly what it says!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product -- even with the small glitch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! I'm a new convert to iced coffee, and it keeps the drinks cold for a very long time. The ice doesn't even melt. At 16 ounces, the size is right for a "grande"-type drink. I'm giving it 5 stars, even though the mechanism in the cap I received does cause some leaking (only if I drink through the cap, which apparently retains some liquid). I asked Klean Kanteen if the Cafe Cap 2.0 is even supposed to be leak-proof, and they said yes. They're kindly sending a replacement cap. I hope it works. But even if it doesn't, I'll keep using this mug--perhaps with more secure cap (not one that I will drink through).
customer_reviews.author: Alice R

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, as described and packaged appropriately. It truly does keep my water cold all day long. I fill with ice in the morning and by late afternoon the ice is still there. I refill with water all day long and it keeps my water cold and fresh. The color of the bottle is great and it's easy to clean with a bottle brush. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bee

customer_reviews.title: Best you can get!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stop raving about this Kleen Kanteen!!!! It really keeps drinks hot forever! I had a hot drink in the early afternoon and by late evening it was still hot. I put it into the refrigerator to keep it from “going bad”. I went to drink it in the morning and it was still warm!! What an amazing product and a great company to support!!!! Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just the best travel mug ever
customer_reviews.text: What I hate about these mugs is losing them. They spend their days with me keeping things truely hot, and amazingly cold. They are great, keeping the dribbles and spills off me, and I even like the feel of the textured finish. Then,sadly they get left behindand no going back ever finds them, think that others find the lost friend, and hope they give it a good home. Only inprovement would be a homing device.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ely

customer_reviews.title: Beats the competitors all day long!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one for my wife and she raved about how her coffee stayed hot well into the afternoon. So I bought another for myself & agree with her 100%. I own Yeti’s & RTICs, but Kleen Kanteen has them beat hands down on staying power & quality. We’ve been using them for a couple of months now and neither of us have had any leaking around the lids.
customer_reviews.author: Torrey Glass

customer_reviews.title: The lid leaks even when closed. I have taken ...
customer_reviews.text: The lid leaks even when closed. I have taken it apart and put it back together again - it still leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: better than a yeti
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey yet worth every penny....this cup/container is the best, so much so that when I lost one...... there was no question and only a matter of an hour to buy another one..... the cafe lid is perfect no leaks no drips and heat retention........ I have worked outside in the snow and have it sitting on a fence post for 3-4 hours and still the contents were very hot
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.

customer_reviews.title: Klean is Great
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in time and in great condition. I purchased this as it is a duplicate of my SOs (hers is basic SS color). It holds the heat well, keeps the drink in the container and if the spout is open and I knock it over the lid STAYS ON and only a few drops get out before I can react. Great features.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Definitely keeps your drink hot!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my coffee and it keeps it hot for a long time. Recently I was outside working in the yard in 35 degree weather and had this sitting out there on a post while I was working. Forgot it was there until about 3 hours later. I twisted the lid to open it and was surprised to find the coffee still hot.
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnatus

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Does an amazing job keeping hot drinks hot. I haven’t tried cold beverages yet. But is the best coffee mug I’ve ever had keeping my drink warm for a long time. Will definitely buy more for friends and family. Taking all the pieces of the lid apart for cleaning can be a task but nothing to discourage buying.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherH

customer_reviews.title: Gift to my husband, but he won't use it because cap leaks
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love Klean Kanteen, and went all in purchasing several bottles and caps both in Amazon and directly from the Klean Kanteen website when they had a sale. And while the customer service seems pretty good (they sent me free dust caps for the sports caps when I requested), and the bottles themselves are beautiful, this cafe cap leaks, no matter how much I disassemble and reassemble it. As this one was a gift, I discovered that after the time window for a return. Additionally, I'm not that impressed with the insulating properties of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: S Jones

customer_reviews.title: Leaks. EVERY TIME.
customer_reviews.text: I think mine must just be faulty but considering what it cost......... I bought my husband one and his is great. Mine leaks EVERY TIME I use it. In the car. On my work clothes. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alison H.

customer_reviews.title: Arguably the best travel mug I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Arguably the best travel mug I've ever purchased. I think mostly because when you're drinking very hot liquid, the lip is large enough that the liquid sits there briefly before hitting your mouth - it gives you a chance to 'sip' before you burn your mouth. Many travel mugs have only two options; drink immediately and risk burning your mouth, or spill it all over yourself. Also - this is mug is very easy to clean, has a water-tight seal, and hold liquid cold or hot for hours... Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best coffee thermos made
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best coffee thermos made for use in the car. The leakproof cafe cap is flawless. I have tried many others and they all leak or are hard to clean. This is perfect. I now have one for the office, and one for the car. Kudos to Klean Kanteen
customer_reviews.author: Theophrastus

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee mug!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee mug. I like the color. It’s durable and leakproof but mostly it fits in my car holder! It’s kind of annoying to clean the mouthpiece. You have to pull apart the four pieces but worth it for the quality. It keeps my coffee warm all day.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Luck

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel mug for coffee. After a full day in my (cold) classroom, I can still enjoy a hot cup of coffee when I finally get a moment to breathe. Keeps liquids warm for long periods of time. the lid is easy to clean and nothing gets trapped. The only downside is that the bottom is stained after using for a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Maplebear

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality - VERY EXPENSIVE
customer_reviews.text: Dont keep my coffee hot And gives a metallic flavor to the coffee
customer_reviews.author: 하하하하

customer_reviews.title: relatively leak proof... awesome to carry around.
customer_reviews.text: i have 3 of these, this one leaks the least. the larger ones seem to leak ALOT more. i had another one that leaked minimally (but i lost it :( - i think its just luck of the draw with the leaking...all in all i love them and i keep buying them!
customer_reviews.author: A. guvenc

customer_reviews.title: Not for big water drinkers
customer_reviews.text: This product would be great if I put coffee or hot tea in it. It does not keep the ice but I guess it does keep it mostly cold. The ice is 100% gone in one night's sleep. The lid makes it to where you more or less have to sip instead of drink it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: great bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water bottle, and for the most part, the only one I use. I only keep water in it and it stays by my bedside, but you could take this bottle anywhere. I got the 16 oz in granite peak and it is perfect for what I need. I haven’t tried dishwashing it, only hand washing, because I badly don’t want to ruin it. It’s kind of difficult to clean the very bottom on the inside of the bottle but it wasn’t much of a concern. It doesn’t dent too easily, but I did drop it once which very slightly dented the bottom. Would definitely recommend to anyone who needs a good long lasting water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Allysa

customer_reviews.title: Really keeps coffee hot! Really!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical ar first, but this keeps coffee hot for hours and hours! Coffee was still steaming after a couple hours...very hot couple hours later...then hot and fresh tasting for hours after that! We liked it so well we bought another one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie D.

customer_reviews.title: not wide mouth
customer_reviews.text: The product is described as wide mouth but is narrow instead. In order to drink out of this, you have to put your back to an uncomfortable position. Returned this and purchased Liquid Savvy instead which came with three caps for a lesser price and am very happy with that purchase.
customer_reviews.author: judy h.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these and will never buy another brand for coffee tumblers. I prefer the matte as the glossy does chip after a while. Keeps my coffee warm all day. I run mine through the dishwasher and I’ve never had an issue. The top isn’t spill proof but I just make sure I keep it upright.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid Displacement
customer_reviews.text: It keeps hot drinks hot and it keeps cold drinks cold; performs as advertised. The problem: the lid. The 12oz Kanteen can contain 12oz of liquid, yes. Unfortunately, that liquid is just as easily displaced by the lid. For sealing purposes, the lid has to be in there good and flush, yes. But I only wish it wouldn't displace 1 out 12 ounces of the contents to do so.
customer_reviews.author: CGB Spender

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my morning commute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my morning commute. It keeps the coffee warm for several of hours which surprised me. The spout also has this thing that you turn to keep all the liquids in. It really is spill proof. I just throw it in my bag and head out for the day. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: ruby valeros

customer_reviews.title: Woke up and my drink was still cold
customer_reviews.text: I put some water and ice in it, and forgot about it and went to sleep. I woke up, went to brush my teeth, sat at my computer for a few minutes, and realized it was still full. And it was still ICE COLD! Amazing purchase. You don't even feel the temperature, but when you open the lid, you can see the ice has barely melted. Will test with hot drinks when I get the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Jah-kwann Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth the money!..going strong after 2.5 years of regular use.
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive but a great product. Nice design, totally leak proof, very comfortable to sip from. Lid is a bit of a pain to clean but you can't have everything I guess! Update: its been 2.5 years since i have been using this. I use it 5 times a week & its been working great! No chipping color or dents! its as good as new. So it doesn't feel pricey anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Knomad

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the old cafe lid!
customer_reviews.text: Finally retired my old 12oz kanteen and got a new one. Can't remember how long I've had the other but i got it when the insulated option was brand new.... Its been a long time. The paint wore off and it had a million dents but worked great until the end. Love the finish on this one... no paint is a plus. Not a fan of the new cafe 2.0 lid. Too many parts makes cleaning a pain. Plus i have limited use of one hand so is hard to assemble and disassemble. Kanteen is still awesome but the new lid sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbitfud

customer_reviews.title: Very nice - with one exception.
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the product except I can taste plastic... from the lid I presume. If I keep it upright then it has no plastic taste. Keeps drink very cold.
customer_reviews.author: Hart

customer_reviews.title: The best thermos based on my experience
customer_reviews.text: The best thermos based on my experience. I have purchased a dozen of these bottles, in different colors and sizes, some as gifts and some for myself. Now I have 3 for myself. I use one for coffee, one for hot water, the other for cold water, at different times of the day or for different trips. Sometimes I carry all three around. The one I have had for the longest (more than 3 years) is still working well, sealed, keeping water hot for hours, and easy to clean. With this particular lid, it’s so easy to take parts off and clean it and put it back. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was HOOKED on this water bottle/coffee mug because of the lid. I bought two. It makes for easy washing, drinking and prevents any weird odor collecting in the rubber ring under the lid. Klean Kanteen has me as a lifetime, loyal customer because of that lid! :)
customer_reviews.author: conservative

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My favorite cup ever! I love this brand. It does not leak, it keeps my drink hot for hours and I get lots of compliments on the cute color. The size is perfect for coffee or tea without being overly large to carry around. I will always buy from klean kanteen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Keeps coffee HOT for so long. Café lid locks tight and doesn't spill in my purse. Very happy with this purchase. The "Insulated" text is barely visible on my dark blue one. Not a fan of the color I chose, might have been better if it wasn't glossy.. but it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Sehl

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the coffee hot
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the coffee hot for several hours and warm the remainder of the day yet the lid allows you to actually sip HOT coffee as soon as it goes in. I now have two. One for work and one for home. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT (but a little pricey)
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Best product I've ever tried, and I tried many insulated coffee mugs. I've been using it for a few months now and it still looks like new. I truly recommend this. The only reason I gave it 4/5 is because it's a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Better than my hydroflask
customer_reviews.text: Love the twist top vs the normal flip tops like I have on my hydroflasks. I actually prefer this one to those surprisingly. Will have to pick up more in other colors. I think this will be replacing the many hydroflasks I've collected.
customer_reviews.author: Pnwseoul

customer_reviews.title: This bottle keeps ice for a while which is good. The lid also seals well when you close ...
customer_reviews.text: This bottle keeps ice for a while which is good. The lid also seals well when you close it. The lid also completely comes apart so that you can clean it thoroughly so that is much appreciated. The one problem I have though is that some how ice will block the water from getting out. So I have to rotate it around a bit and even tip it up farther, then the water comes rushing out. So the lid needs a little more thought.
customer_reviews.author: Mercenary

customer_reviews.title: Love the cup, hate the lid!
customer_reviews.text: This cup is so efficient at being spill proof that I can’t even get the liquid out. For some reason the spout varies in its consistency from sip to sip. It’s so frustrating. I should have returned it immediately but I thought I would give it a chance and after using it for a few months I still hate it!!! I’m switching to the hydro flask which has a different lid/spout which allows for a consistent flow of liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Eloespez

customer_reviews.title: Klean Kanteen never fails to amaze me. I'm a teacher and I often forget ...
customer_reviews.text: Klean Kanteen never fails to amaze me. I'm a teacher and I often forget I brought tea, or let's face it, I'm too busy to drink my beverage. Whether it's a hot or cold drink, it never goes luke warm during my work day. If I put ice in the cup, there are still ice cubes when I get home from work. Amazing bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L. Akemon

customer_reviews.title: It's a good leak resistant travel coffee mug
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee travel mug! The company is right when they said it doesn't leak. But the key is you have to make sure all the parts are put in right, then tighten the plastic wheel under the cap. Tilt it upside down....no leaks!
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Coffee Mug (but arrived dented)
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I'm not giving this 5 stars it's because the product arrived dented. Like other buyers before reported, the bottom rim was dented. Not sure if it happened during shipping or it was like that. Other than that, the product works great...it's the insulated coffee mug I have used. No weird metallic taste like others reported and absolutely leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I've been using this about 2 months now. It's easy to clean and living up to all its great reviews. I use it everyday for tea and water. The top is easy to disassemble, clean and re-assmeble. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: First one leaked, replacement seems leakproof
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended the 12oz Klean Kanteen by a friend who waxed eloquent about how the size was perfect and the lid is leak proof. I ordered one and realized within the first couple days of use that it was quite leaky. I reported the problem to Amazon and received a replacement today. The new one does not leak and the lid seems to be a lot tighter. I do love the size and shape and how easily it fits into bags and my car cup holder. I'm only giving 4 stars instead of 5 because of the original leaky one. I hope that leaky lid is an anomaly!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I'm not crazy about the SS bottom because it scratches so easily, but it's a minor detraction from what is ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my coffee piping hot through the morning commute and meetings. Being able to take apart the cap for cleaning is a huge plus. I'm not crazy about the SS bottom because it scratches so easily, but it's a minor detraction from what is otherwise a solid travel mug.
customer_reviews.author: MsRaiko

customer_reviews.title: 10 STARS! ⭐🌟⭐🌟⭐🌟⭐🌟⭐🌟
customer_reviews.text: Meet my new BFF!! So, did not expect THREE HOURS (and still going) of WARM TEA!! 💃🏽💃🏽💃🏽💃🏽 I made fresh, steeped, green, orange, ginger, loose, tea with organic honey and Stevia and LET ME TELL YOU S.O.M.E.T.H.I.N.G. this canteen has made me a happy woman!! Thank you. I will be gifting more, indeed I will!! Ciao.
customer_reviews.author: French Angel

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Coffee Mug
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't leak, keeps Coffee warm as long as a yeti, and doesn't have that nasty metal taste some mugs have. Have used it every day for 2+ years and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Snuffy

customer_reviews.title: Not too hot!
customer_reviews.text: Product did not keep contents as hot as it claimed. Container was used for hot coffee. I have purchased and been using another brand container by a different company for many years, which keeps contents hot for approximately 7-8 hours. The reason I was looking to replace the container was that I have dropped the container a million times and I broke the lid covering the vacuum sealing button and the company no longer produces the same product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermos, Excellent Cap
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this thing. We use Klean Kanteen canteens, but this is the first of their thermoses we've tried. It is excellent, keeps ice-water for about 2 days. We will definitely be buying more in the future, both for ourselves and others. I've had no issues with the cap, it seals well enough and helps insulate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hyperiox

customer_reviews.title: Works well, very tough
customer_reviews.text: Klean Kanteen’s are very durable and keep cold drinks very cold for a long time. Hot drinks will stay hot for about 8-12 hours. This is my fourth Klean Kanteen.
customer_reviews.author: Pharmer Norm

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle. The twist cap won't accidentally open in a bag, and it come apart for cleaning. The wild orchid color is not as hot pink as it looks on the web. It's more of a purplish pink which I actually like more.
customer_reviews.author: Gwalchgwynn

customer_reviews.title: Still the best
customer_reviews.text: This is a great 18/8 stainless steel double-wall vacuum insulated tumbler or thermos. I purchased the 20 ounce size. Keeps my beverage hot or cold. I find it to be amongst the best leak proof tumbler out. My only issue with the Klean Kanteen is the vacuum chamber is too efficient and keeps the coffee/beverage from vacating the opening as the midpoint of the container is reached. Overall, I am genuinely happy with the Klean Kanteen and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: The Watcher

customer_reviews.title: Very nice coffee mug
customer_reviews.text: Keeps stuff hot four hours and hours. Top leaked out of the box, but was simply a loose nut that was tightened easily by hand—after which, no leak. Like the simplicity of the top when drinking, and it fits in my car. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Good purcharse
customer_reviews.text: For me this item is an investment. I got 7 bottle in different sizes. One for each member of the family and for me one at home and one for work. All the full of ice and water.
customer_reviews.author: Gisela Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Works
customer_reviews.text: My spouse received on as a gift. I've since bought two more with cafe lids. I use them for bedside ice waterduring the night. I always hive ice cubes remaining up to twenty hours. I've not tested hot drinks, beyond four hours, but excellent performance there as well. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: RDS

customer_reviews.title: Take good care of your Klean Kanteen.
customer_reviews.text: Be diligent about cleaning both the cap and mug. I wasn’t and algae grew in both! A quick rinse is not enough, take apart the cap and wash it then use a bottle brush to really scrub the sides of the mug. The algae was my fault by not cleaning the Kanteen properly.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Dugan

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: kleen kanteen are amazing, I bought this one as a gift and he loved it, he bought one for his wife because SHE loved it! He uses it for coffee and I warned him that it would keep it hot and be TOO hot so be careful. He found out my warnings were correct but really loves that it keeps his coffee hot all day. If you are on the fence GET ONE. I just bought one for my one year old that is how much I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Brandie  Dankiw

customer_reviews.title: I love Klean Kanteen
customer_reviews.text: I love Klean Kanteen! They always do a great job with the quality of their products! I love how well insulated the mug is; everything is always still piping hot for hours. The cap is leak proof si I haven't had any spills either! Overall I love it and also how sheek it looks in stainless steel!
customer_reviews.author: EMc

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell like coffee or stain after washing
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my coffee hot for longer than the plastic alternatives. Fits in the cup holders in my car. Doesn't smell like coffee or stain after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New caps are awful!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Klean Kanteen for many years. Love the products. However I DISLIKE the new cafe caps VERY MUCH! Too many pieces to take apart and clean. I wish I could purchase the old caps, but was told they no longer make them. Too bad. I will think twice before ordering anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Bray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 20-oz thermos water bottle, top tricky to wash
customer_reviews.text: Keeps cold liquids cold for 48 hours. That's how long it took ice cubes in cold water to melt; even after that, the water remained cold enough to drink for several hours. The top is a mechanical puzzle. It's tricky to reassemble after washing and leaks if you don't put it back together exactly right. If the top were easier to clean, I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Defect product
customer_reviews.text: The product I received is not isolated. After adding hot beverage, you can feel the warmth when holding the container. It sent cold with a hour. It was a defect product.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of Klean Kaneteen
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with Kean Kanteen lids is that they leak. I like the look of Klean Kaneteen, then buy a leak free Hydroflask Lid, that I can put the thing in my purse sideways and upside down and it doesn't leak. Regardless, these keep things cool for MANY MANY hours. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ILMLover

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Liked the color, matches the rest of my bike. Does not leak at all and that's with constant bouncing on my bike. Keeps my drinks at temp I need it to. It is good to know that it's high quality and I don't have to baby it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan N

customer_reviews.title: Totally leakproof and keeps drinks HOT!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Nice looking and, best of all, very leakproof. Fits well in my hand, which is quite small. Keep liquids hot for a LONG time. Only quibble is that the spout doesn't pour all that easily -- probably a trade-off for the leakproof-ness -- but it's no big deal, as this is still better than any other travel mug I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love that this keeps my coffee warm for hours
customer_reviews.text: I love that this keeps my coffee warm for hours. At work, sometimes I don't get to finish my coffee until close to noon and it is still hot. The lid is not simple to take apart and wash, but after a couple of times and you become more familiar with the process and it becomes much easier and faster. Pull up a video to make it easy on yourself the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Colby's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great when upright, disappoints when it gets tipped over accidentally
customer_reviews.text: Keeps stuff warm like your regular kleen kanteen. But, beware, if it tips over or you put it in a backpack side pocket and you happen to bend over, you're in for a fast spillage of your hot beverage. Wish I had known, I kind of thought it would be like my trusty contigo mugs. Alas...
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this! Cap leaks when tipped over
customer_reviews.text: The top is plastic and with hot coffee no matter how tight the parts of the cap are screwed together, container tips over and all the coffee drips out into your bag: Everything ruined!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Just take my money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Klean Kanteen. Enough said. Bought this one because I lost my last one. The whole family has one it’s one of my favorite products especially in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: BKNY1981

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: This is my second KK. Unfortunately I damaged the seal on my last one after one too many falls. Well worth the money, cold stays cold & hot stays hot. Nothing else compares. I’m a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: L. Radja

customer_reviews.title: Truly drip and spill proof, and Keeps coffee hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best truly spill and drip-proof travel, at home, or at the office coffee mugs on the market! I have collected various coffee mugs over the years, and this mug keeps my coffee hot the longest! The colorful and durable powder coating makes it easier to hold too.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The "leak proof" lid leaks like a sieve
customer_reviews.text: The "leak proof" lid leaks like a sieve. You can tighten it down more, but then very little liquid comes out when it's open. There is some paint chipping as well, doesn't bother me but is worth mentioning. Overall, I think there are better products for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mcdonald

product_meta.title: Klean Kanteen Wide Double Wall Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Coffee Mug with Leak Proof Café Cap 2.0
product_meta.description: The Klean Kanteen Vacuum Insulated Wide 16oz is Klean Kanteen's is the best travel coffee mug solution for hot coffee, cold brew, tea, water and more. The 16oz Insulated Wide bottle will keep drinks hot for 10 hours and iced for 30. Long enough to have hot coffee during a long day at the office and iced tea for a weekend adventure. The leak proof Cafe Cap 2.0 keeps drinks safely contained and completely spill free. The Cafe Cap 2.0 has easy to clean construction and crafted from BPA-free polypropylene #5 and food-grade silicone. Kanteen is crafted from high quality, durable food grade 18/8 stainless steel. Wide 2.125 inch (54mm) opening fits ice and is easy to fill and pour. Electropolished interior and rounded corners make the Vacuum Insulated Wide 20oz bottle easy to clean and maintain. All Klean Kanteen products are made using safe healthy materials and backed by the Strong as Steel Guarantee. Hand washing recommended.
feature_bullets: Double Wall Vacuum Insulation, Keeps Hot up to 14 Hours, Keeps Iced up to 40 Hours
Food Grade 18/8 Stainless Steel, BPA-free Polypropylene #5, Food Grade Silicone Construction
Comes with Leak Proof Café Cap 2.0 with Easy Clean Construction
Large 2.125 inch (54 millimeter) opening fits ice, easy to fill and pour; Compatible with all Klean Kanteen Wide caps
Backed by the Klean Kanteen Strong as Steel Guarantee

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
